Text.Page:
Far too many orcans are happy to war with the federation forever. That way lies ruin and death.

The {@LinkCreature:41#4004#Black Claw berserkers}, {@LinkCreature:41#4005#slaughterers}, and {@LinkCreature:41#3006#blood fighters} are the most warlike of all. I would like to take their insane eyes to {@LinkCreature:241#1023$$Majduk} as proof of their madness. Will you help me do this?
Now I'll take these eyes to the other tribes and try to convince them to lay down their arms. Thank you, <PCNAME>.
Kill the {@LinkCreature:41#4004#Black Claw berserkers}, {@LinkCreature:41#4005#slaughterers}, and {@LinkCreature:41#3006#blood fighters} and bring me their eyeballs.
